file.name: disces-openapiv3.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: DISCES API
  description: >
    A typical major requirement in a Smart City/Cloud environment consists of an
    engine for distributed task scheduling. In this context, DISIT lab developed
    an efficient solution for Smart management and scheduling, Distributed SCE
    Scheduler, DISCES. DISCES consists of a set of distributed instances of
    running agents performing concurrent tasks. DISCES engine with cluster
    functionality allows adding distributed nodes and defining jobs, without
    service downtime.
  contact:
    name: Daniele Cenni
    email: daniele.cenni@unifi.it
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://192.168.0.23:8080'
paths:
  /SmartCloudEngine/index.jsp:
    get:
      tags:
        - API
      description: >
        The full list of the APIs that can be accessed via a HTTP GET request
        follows:

        * **checkExistJob** 

          _Description:_ API to check the existence of a job on the scheduler. 
          
          _Input model:_ id_name_group_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output

        * **checkExistTrigger**

          _Description:_ API to check the existence of a trigger on the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **clear**

          _Description:_ API to delete all jobs and triggers on the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_output
          
        * **clearScheduler**

          _Description:_ alias of _clear_.
          
        * **deleteCalendar**

          _Description:_ API to delete a calendar on the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_calendar_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **deleteJob**

          _Description:_ API to delete a job from the scheduler, and all associated triggers.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **getCurrentlyExecutingJobs**

          _Description:_ API to ask for a list of running jobs.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ tabular_json_output
          
        * **getTriggersOfJob**

          _Description:_ API to ask for a list of running jobs.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ tabular_json_output
          
        * **getJobDetail**

          _Description:_ API to ask for job details.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **getJobGroupNames**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for a list of groups.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ numbered_values_json_output
          
        * **getPausedTriggerGroups**
          
          _Description:_ API to ask for a list of paused triggers.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ numbered_values_json_output
          
        * **getSchedulerInstanceId**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for the scheduler's instance id.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ string_output
          
        * **getSchedulerName**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for the scheduler's instance name.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ string_output
          
        * **getTriggerGroupNames**
          
          _Description:_ API to ask for a list of all triggers.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ numbered_values_json_output
          
        * **getTriggerKeys**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for a list of all triggers in a group.
          
          _Input model:_ id_triggerGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ numbered_values_json_output

        * **getTriggersOfJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for a list of all triggers of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ tabular_json_output
          
        * **getTriggerState**
        
          _Description:_ API to request a trigger status.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ string_output
          
        * **interruptJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the interruption of all instances of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **interruptJobInstance**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the interruption of an instance of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **interruptJobs**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the interruption of all running jobs.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **interruptFireInstanceId**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the interruption of an instance of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_fire_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
      
        * **isInStandbyMode**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask if the scheduler is on standby.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **isShutdown**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask if the scheduler is shutdown.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **isStarted**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask if the scheduler is running.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **pauseTriggers**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask you to pause all triggers (including future triggers).
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **pauseJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to prompt you to pause a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **pauseJobs**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for a list of all triggers in a group.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **pauseTrigger**
        
          _Description:_ API to prompt you to pause a trigger.
          
          _Input model:_ id_triggerName_triggerGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **pauseTriggers**
        
          _Description:_ API to prompt you to pause a trigger.
          
          _Input model:_ id_groupName_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **rescheduleJob**
        
          _Description:_ API for requesting job rescheduling.
          
          _Input model:_ id_wi_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **resumeAll**
        
          _Description:_ API to request resume of all jobs and triggers.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **resumeJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request a job resume.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **resumeJobs**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for a group's job resume.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **resumeTrigger**
        
          _Description:_ API to request a trigger resume.
          
          _Input model:_ id_triggerName_triggerGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **resumeTriggers**
        
          _Description:_ API to request resume of triggers of a group.
          
          _Input model:_ id_groupName_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output       
          
        * **shutdownScheduler**
        
          _Description:_ API for requesting scheduler shutdowns.
        
          _Input model:_ id_wait4jobs2complete_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **standbyScheduler**
        
          _Description:_ API to request standby of the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **startScheduler**
        
          _Description:_ API for requesting the scheduler start.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **startDelayed**
        
          _Description:_ API for requesting delayed scheduler start.
          
          _Input model:_ id_seconds_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **truncateCatalinaLog**
        
          _Description:_ API to request for Catalina log truncate (Tomcat).
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **triggerJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request for a job execution.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **unscheduleJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request removal of a job from the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **listJobTriggers**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for a job trigger list.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ table_row_json_output
          
        * **updateJobDataMap**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for a job trigger list.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_jobDataMap_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **addJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request to add a job to the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_jobClass_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output

        * **getNotificationEmail**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for the notification email associated with the job completion.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **getJobDataMap**
        
          _Description:_ API to request for a job data map in JSON format.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **getJobFireTimes**
        
          _Description:_ API to request job firing times.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **getJobTriggers**
        
          _Description:_ API to request job triggers.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ tabular_json_output_essential
          
        * **getSchedulerMetadata**
        
          _Description:_ API to request scheduler metadata.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **getSystemStatus**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the scheduler node status.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **getConnectionPoolInfo**
        
          _Description:_ API for requesting connection pool information for the database.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **buildTriggerForJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the creation of a trigger for a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **setJobProgress**
        
          _Description:_ API to set the percentage progress of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_fireid_progress_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **getJobProgress**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the percentage progress of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_fireid_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ string_html_output
          
      parameters:
        - name: json
          description: >-
            The parameter value is expected to be a serialized JSON object.
            Refer to the description of the API of your interest to know how
            your input should be shaped (_input model_). Reach the _Models_ section at the bottom of this page and explode the model of your interest to know more about it.
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: object
            oneOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_calendar_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_fire_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_fireid_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_fireid_progress_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_groupName_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_name_group_fire_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_jobName_jobGrp_jobClass_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_jobName_jobGrp_jobDataMap_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_triggerGrp_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_triggerName_triggerGrp_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_jobGrp_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_seconds_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_wait4jobs2complete_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_wi_jobName_jobGrp_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/table_row_json_output'

      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Different APIs provide different outputs. Refer to the description
            of the API of your interest to know how its output is shaped (output
            model).
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                oneOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bool_json_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bool_html_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bool_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/string_html_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/tabular_json_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/tabular_json_output_essential'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/key_value_json_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/numbered_values_json_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/string_output'
    post:
      tags:
        - API
      description: >
        The full list of the available functionalities that can be accessed
        through an HTTP POST request follows:

        * **checkExistJob** 

          _Description:_ API to check the existence of a job on the scheduler. 
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **checkExistTrigger**

          _Description:_ API to check the existence of a trigger on the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **clear**

          _Description:_ API to delete all jobs and triggers on the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_output
          
        * **clearScheduler**

          _Description:_ alias of _clear_
          
        * **deleteCalendar**

          _Description:_ API to delete a calendar on the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_calendar_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **deleteJob**

          _Description:_ API to delete a job from the scheduler, and all associated triggers.

          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **getCurrentlyExecutingJobs**

          _Description:_ API to ask for a list of running jobs.

          _Output model:_ tabular_json_output
          
        * **getTriggersOfJob**

          _Output model:_ tabular_json_output
          
        * **getJobDetail**

        * **getJobGroupNames**

        * **getPausedTriggerGroups**

        * **getSchedulerInstanceId**

        * **getTriggerState**

        * **interruptJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the interruption of all instances of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **interruptJobInstance**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the interruption of an instance of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_name_group_fire_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **interruptJobs**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the interruption of all running jobs.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **interruptFireInstanceId**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the interruption of an instance of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_fire_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **isInStandbyMode**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask if the scheduler is on standby.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **isShutdown**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask if the scheduler is shutdown.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **isStarted**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask if the scheduler is running.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **pauseTriggers**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask you to pause all triggers (including future triggers).
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **pauseJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to prompt you to pause a job.

          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **pauseJobs**

          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **pauseTrigger**
        
          _Description:_ API to prompt you to pause a trigger.
          
          _Input model:_ id_triggerName_triggerGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **pauseTriggers**
        
          _Description:_ API to prompt you to pause a trigger.
          
          _Input model:_ id_groupName_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **rescheduleJob**
        
          _Description:_ API for requesting job rescheduling.
          
          _Input model:_ id_wi_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **resumeAll**
        
          _Description:_ API to request resume of all jobs and triggers.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **resumeJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request a job resume.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **resumeJobs**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for a group's job resume.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **resumeTrigger**
        
          _Description:_ API to request a trigger resume.
          
          _Input model:_ id_triggerName_triggerGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **resumeTriggers**
        
          _Description:_ API to request resume of triggers of a group.
          
          _Input model:_ id_groupName_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output 
          
        * **shutdownScheduler**
        
          _Description:_ API for requesting scheduler shutdowns.
        
          _Input model:_ id_wait4jobs2complete_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **standbyScheduler**
        
          _Description:_ API to request standby of the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **startScheduler**
        
          _Description:_ API for requesting the scheduler start.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **startDelayed**
        
          _Description:_ API for requesting delayed scheduler start.
          
          _Input model:_ id_seconds_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **truncateCatalinaLog**

          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **triggerJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request for a job execution.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **unscheduleJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request removal of a job from the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **listJobTriggers**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for a job trigger list.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ table_row_json_output
          
        * **updateJobDataMap**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for a job trigger list.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_jobDataMap_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **addJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request to add a job to the scheduler.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_jobClass_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **getNotificationEmail**
        
          _Description:_ API to ask for the notification email associated with the job completion.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **getJobDataMap**
        
          _Description:_ API to request for a job data map in JSON format.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **getJobFireTimes**
        
          _Description:_ API to request job firing times.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **getJobTriggers**
        
          _Description:_ API to request job triggers.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ tabular_json_output_essential
          
        * **getSchedulerMetadata**
        
          _Description:_ API to request scheduler metadata.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **getSystemStatus**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the scheduler node status.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **getConnectionPoolInfo**
        
          _Description:_ API for requesting connection pool information for the database.
          
          _Input model:_ id_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
          
        * **buildTriggerForJob**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the creation of a trigger for a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_json_output
          
        * **setJobProgress**
        
          _Description:_ API to set the percentage progress of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_fireid_progress_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ bool_html_output
          
        * **getJobProgress**
        
          _Description:_ API to request the percentage progress of a job.
          
          _Input model:_ id_fireid_input_json
          
          _Output model:_ string_html_output
          
      requestBody:
        description: >-
          Refer to the description of the API of your interest to know how your
          input should be shaped (_input model_).
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              oneOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_calendar_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_fire_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_fireid_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_fireid_progress_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_groupName_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_name_group_fire_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_jobName_jobGrp_jobClass_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_jobName_jobGrp_jobDataMap_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_jobName_jobGrp_jobClass_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_triggerGrp_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_triggerName_triggerGrp_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_jobGrp_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_seconds_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_wait4jobs2complete_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/id_wi_jobName_jobGrp_input_json'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/table_row_json_output'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Different APIs provide different outputs. Refer to the description
            of the API of your interest to know how its output is shaped (output
            model).
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                oneOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bool_json_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bool_html_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bool_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/string_html_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/tabular_json_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/tabular_json_output_essential'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/key_value_json_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/numbered_values_json_output'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/string_output'
components:
  schemas:
    bool_html_output:
      type: string
      format: html
      enum:
        - <p>true</p>
        - <p>false</p>
      example: <p>true</p>
    bool_json_output:
      type: object
      properties:
        '0':
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            enum:
              - response
          example:
            - response
        '1':
          type: boolean
          example: false
      example:
        '0':
          - response
        '1': 'false'
    bool_output:
      oneOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bool_html_output'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bool_json_output'
    id_calendar_input_json:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: deleteCalendar
        calendarName:
          description: The calendar name.
          type: string
          example: my_calendar_name
    id_fire_input_json:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - fireInstanceId
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: checkExistJob
        fireInstanceId:
          description: The job’s instance id.
          type: string
          example: debian14567344086331456734410234
    id_fireid_input_json:
      description: Semantically alias of _id_fire_input_json_.
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - fire_instance_id
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: setJobProgress
        fire_instance_id:
          description: The job’s instance id.
          type: string
          example: debian14567344086331456734410234
    id_fireid_progress_input_json:
      description: Semantically alias of _id_fire_input_json_.
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - fire_instance_id
        - progress
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: setJobProgress
        fire_instance_id:
          description: The job’s instance id.
          type: string
          example: debian14567344086331456734410234
        progress:
          description: The progress percentage of a job
          type: integer
          format: int32
          example: 30
    id_groupName_input_json:
      description: Semantically alias of id_triggerGrp_input_json model.
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - groupName
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: pauseTriggers
        groupName:
          description: The (trigger) group name.
          type: string
          example: group1 
    id_jobGrp_input_json:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - jobGroup
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: pauseJobs
        jobGroup:
          description: The group name.
          type: string
          example: group1 
    id_seconds_input_json:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - seconds
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: startDelayed
        seconds:
          description: The seconds of delay.
          type: integer
          format: int32
          example: 600       
    id_triggerGrp_input_json:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - triggerGroup
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: getTriggerKeys
        triggerGroup:
          description: The group name.
          type: string
          example: group1   

    id_triggerName_triggerGrp_input_json:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - triggerName
        - triggerGroup
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: checkExistJob
        triggerName:
          description: The trigger name.
          type: string
          example: trigger1
        jobGroup:
          description: The trigger group.
          type: string
          example: group1
    id_input_json:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: clear
    id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - jobName
        - jobGroup
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: checkExistJob
        jobName:
          description: The job name.
          type: string
          example: job1
        jobGroup:
          description: The job group.
          type: string
          example: group1
    id_jobName_jobGrp_jobDataMap_input_json:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - jobName
        - jobGroup
        - jobDataMap
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: updateJobDataMap
        jobName:
          description: The job name.
          type: string
          example: job1
        jobGroup:
          description: The job group.
          type: string
          example: group1
        jobDataMap:
          description: The job data map in JSON format.
          type: object
    id_jobName_jobGrp_jobClass_input_json:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - jobName
        - jobGroup
        - jobClass
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: addJob
        jobName:
          description: The job name.
          type: string
          example: job1
        jobGroup:
          description: The job group.
          type: string
          example: group1
        jobClass:
          description: The job class.
          type: string
          example: class1
    id_name_group_fire_input_json:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - jobName
        - jobGroup
        - fireInstanceId
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: checkExistJob
        jobName:
          description: The job name.
          type: string
          example: job1
        jobGroup:
          description: The job group.
          type: string
          example: group1
        fireInstanceId:
          description: The job’s instance id.
          type: string
          example: debian14567344086331456734410234
    id_wait4jobs2complete_input_json:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: shutdownScheduler
        waitForJobsToComplete:
          description: If true, the scheduler is shutdown when jobs are completed, otherwise it will be shutdown immediately.
          type: boolean
          example: true
    id_wi_jobName_jobGrp_input_json:
      description: Semantically alias of id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json.
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - withIdentityNameGroup
      properties:
        id:
          description: >-
            The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing
            of the exposed APIs.
          type: string
          example: rescheduleJob
        withIdentityNameGroup:
          description: The job and group names separated by a dot (.)
          type: string
          example: job1.grp1
    key_value_json_output:
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        oneOf:
          - type: string
          - type: array
      example: |
        {"#isNonConcurrent":"[{\"processPath\":\"\\\/opt\\\/jdk1.8.0_51\\\/bin\\\/java\"},{\"cp\":\"-classpath\"},{\"lib\":\":\\\/var\\\/www\\\/html\\\/sce\\\/test\\\/lib\\\/*\"},{\"InsertTweets\":\"inserttweets.InsertTweets\"},{\"insertTweets.properties\":\"\\\/var\\\/www\\\/html\\\/sce\\\/test\\\/lib\\\/insertTweets.properties\"}]"}
    numbered_values_json_output:
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        type: string
      example: |
        {"0":"InsertTweetsRecommender","1":"TwitterVigilanceIndexing"}
    string_html_output:
      type: string
      format: html
      example: <p>30</30>
    string_output:
      description: Typically returned by those APIs that are expected to provide the identifier, name, or status of one entity.
      type: string
      example: debian1456734408633
    tabular_json_output:
      type: object
      properties:
        '0':
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            enum:
              - response
          example:
            - response
        '1':
          description: Serialization of a JSON that aims to represent a set of numbered rows through arrays of unlabeled values (positional semantic).
          type: string
          example: |
            "{\"0\":[\"job1\",\"group1\",\"Sat Mar 12 14:07:44 CET 2016\"]}"
      example: |
        {"0":["response"],"1":"{\"0\":[\"job1\",\"group1\",\"Sat Mar 12 14:07:44 CET 2016\"]}"}
    tabular_json_output_essential:
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        type: array
    table_row_json_output:
      type: object
      properties:
        '0':
          description: Headers
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          example: |
            ["Trigger Name","Trigger Group","Calendar Name","Description","End Time","Final Fire Time","Misfire Instruction","Next Fire Time","Previous Fire Time","Priority","Start Time","May Fire Again"]
        '1':
          description: Values
          type: array
          example: |
            ["7e369086-851f-4191-927f-229327d0f44c","4b2cf714-cd6c-4265-8b2e-702a80150736","","","","","0","Thu Mar 17 12:00:00 CET 2016","Thu Mar 17 06:00:00 CET 2016","5","Thu Dec 10 12:00:00 CET 2015","true"]
      example: |
        {"0":["Trigger Name","Trigger Group","Calendar Name","Description","End Time","Final Fire Time","Misfire Instruction","Next Fire Time","Previous Fire Time","Priority","Start Time","May Fire Again"],"1":["7e369086-851f-4191-927f-229327d0f44c","4b2cf714-cd6c-4265-8b2e-702a80150736","","","","","0","Thu Mar 17 12:00:00 CET 2016","Thu Mar 17 06:00:00 CET 2016","5","Thu Dec 10 12:00:00 CET 2015","true"]}

  description: 'DISCES: DISTRIBUTED SCE SCHEDULER TOOLS (SCE: SMART CITY/CLOUD ENGINE), A DISIT TOOL FOR SMART ENVIRONMENTS'
  url: http://www.disit.org/drupal/?q=node/6746
